https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vhGsHyw9rAVljiUUJUqTKf0S7ep.jpg Before the streaming era, the video stores were the key for the beginning of home video experience in Brazil. The documentary narrates the history of S達o Paulo's mom-and-pop video stores from its appearance to the vanishing of this platform. Owners, employees, customers and critics talk about the experience of renting a movie. CineMagia: The Story of S達o Paulo's Video Stores
